cast.overview: The harrowing true story of two elite US Navy fighter pilots during the Korean War. Their heroic sacrifices would ultimately make them the Navy's most celebrated wingmen.
cast.title: Devotion

details.biography: Joshua Whichard is an American actor. He began his career with supporting/lead roles in shorts films while he was in film school leading to guest starring and smaller roles in The Outsider(2020), The Resident(2021), and Queens(2021). He has since had roles on Devotion(2022) and starred as Paul Murdaugh in The Murdaugh Murders(2023). He has had the privilege of working with actors such as, Jason Bateman, Glen Powell, Ben Mendlesohn, and Johnathan Majors among others.
details.name: Joshua Whichard
